txt.en:
'You! You here to help, yes? Of course, of course! Angmar and the Snowreap serve the same lord, the Great Eye. You help us, good.

'The mines, digging claws, nasty beaks, terrible flesh. They bite us, break us, sometimes kill! The terrible stone-eaters. The crawling death.

'You go now, kill the creeping claw-skittering cave-dwellers, yes?'
'Good, good! No more crawling claws in the cave. We work now, help the army!\n\n'Glory to Angmar! Glory to the Eye! Glory to the Snowreap!'
'You help now, yes! The mines, go to the mines!'

Cave-claws dig through the stone and threaten the goblins working the Isendeep near Grothum. The leaders of the village implored you as an ally to the Snowreap to assist them in destroying the terrible little creatures.
Cave-claws can be found in the Isendeep mine.\n\nBok begged you to help defend the goblins in the mines.
Bok awaits your return at Grothum.\n\nYou slaughtered the cave-claws you encountered to defend the pathetic goblins. You should return to Bok with the news.
